house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1948 has 5 bedroom(s), 5 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) and approximately 5046 square feet of living area. Rooms include den, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, private spa, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: Wimbish-Riteway Re Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Central Vacuum, Dishwasher, Foyer, Intercom System, Ocean Access,Trash Compacter
